com.soen.riskgame.module.new_game

Class NewGameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soen.riskgame.module.new_game.NewGameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoadMapCommand.LoadMapListener, PlayerCommandListener, View, java.util.Observer

    public class NewGameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements View, PlayerCommandListener, LoadMapCommand.LoadMapListener, java.util.Observer
    Class represents the start of the new game. Calss implements methods of View(GUI) and command(player command and load map command) amd also the observer new start start by calling this class, which selects the players(add and remove) , updates and binds the view
